dialogue.text: (Whoever arranged this definitely take their time to clean up after themselves)
(It looks like they left behind some unopened canned fish)
(You never know when they might come in handy)
(I don't think they'll mind if I take some)
<color=yellow>During the day, different actions will drain your stamina.<wait=0.5> Don't forget to look after yourself and stay energized whiles exploring!</color>
<color=yellow>Food will not only make you gain strength but might also possess unique abilities</color>
<color=yellow>Some food might drain your stamina;<wait=0.5> others, nasty side effects</color>
<color=yellow>While food is as great and all, nothing is as efficient as a deep nights sleep</color>
<color=yellow>Seeing the moon shine bright will naturally make you sleepy, and eating food before bedtime is a bit counterintuitive</color>
